summary.span: 表示从数字化仪和触笔收集到的单个数据点。

span.span: Represents a single data point collected from the digitizer and stylus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个当用户输入墨迹使用数字化器时，收集数据。A collects data when a user inputs ink using the digitizer. 因为这取决于制造商中的属性不同的数字化器报告的信息而异。Because the information that a digitizer reports differs depending on the manufacturer, the properties within a can vary. 若要确定属性是否位于，调用方法。To determine whether a property is in the , call the method. 属性包含，它指定哪些属性以。The property contains a that specifies which properties are in the . 所有对象包含指定的属性 （x，y） 坐标，以及在压力。All objects contain properties that specify the (x, y) coordinates, as well as the pressure. ## Examples 下面的示例获取属性名称和值为每个在。The following example gets property names and values for each in a . 此示例假定有调用`packetOutput`。This example assumes that there is a called `packetOutput`. [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pressureFactor` 必须具有值 0 和 1 之间，非独占。`pressureFactor` must have a value between 0 and 1, inclusive. 值为 0 表示没有压力应用，而值为 1 表示，应用的最大的压力量。A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied. 值 0.5 表示 50%的最大的压力应用时，依次类推。A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建。The following example demonstrates how to create a . summary.span: 获取或设置一个介于 0 和 1 之间的值，以反映在创建 时，触笔施加于数字化仪图面的压力大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value between 0 and 1 that reflects the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface when the is created.

value.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间的值，用于指示在创建 时，触笔施加于数字化仪图面的压力大小。

span.span: Value between 0 and 1 indicating the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface as the is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性表示为介于 0 和 1 之间的值。The value of the property is expressed as a value between 0 and 1. 值为 0 表示没有压力应用，而值为 1 表示，应用的最大的压力量。A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied. 值 0.5 表示 50%的最大的压力应用时，依次类推。A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来检索和压力值显示为每个中调用`points`。The following example uses the property to retrieve and display the pressure value for each in a called `points`. 此示例假定有调用`packetOutput`。This example assumes that there is a called `packetOutput`.
